name: Dummy
text: I was completely swept up in the world of the film. I've never seen anything quite like it before.

name: Sahil Sant
text: I couldn't stop thinking about it after it ended. The story was so compelling. I was left in awe of the sheer brilliance of it all.

name: Alisha Sule
text: I was blown away by the creativity and imagination. I was on the edge of my seat the entire time. The dialogue was witty and clever.

name: Zeeshan Tata
text: I loved every minute of it.

name: Prerak Lala
text: I was left breathless by the sheer brilliance of it all. I was completely blown away by the sheer talent on display. The movie was a tour de force of storytelling.
